entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A few snow showers are possibly overnight and early Saturday morning. However, little, if any, snow is expected to settle on the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected from late Friday evening through Saturday morning. 1 to 2 cm may settle on the road above 800 metres between 10 pm Friday and 6 am Saturday.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
